alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Henry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 12:43PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Henry and south central Franklin Counties and the City of Martinsville through 115 PM EDT... At 1243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bassett, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martinsville... Bassett... Sydnorsville... Villa Heights... Chatmoss... Collinsville... and Philpott Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
